Articles.Content:
My KSP has been crashing every hour orso since 0.90. I have updated all my mods, did a clean install and deleted the mods that are not essential to me.

I'm using Win7 64bit with KSP 32bit.

What I have left is:

  • In Flight Waypoints
  • MechJeb
  • NEAR
  • Procedural Fairings
  • Kerbal Alarm Clock
  • ModuleManager 2.5.4

All the logs I could find + Savegame on Google Drive

https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0By9azxHKlc13aHZ1N29raW5GNVk&usp=sharing

These logs are from just after the fresh reinstall. It was the first time I started playing since, and the first time it crashed since.

The issue is hard to reproduce. I don't know how to cause it, but it happened this time after crashing the Duna Dropper 3 ship (hard and awesome) and trying to quickload. When it crashes, I don't get the nice alertbox saying I should contact the devs about this issue. It just shows the desktop, as tho as I had hit alt+f4.

I hope someone can help fix this or maybe help blame one of the mods for me.

Edited January 11, 2015 by JoerT
Please provide all the information requested in the How To Get Support sticky, especially, but not limited to, mod version numbers and the output_log.txt.

It seems I had included the wrong log file. The output.log is now added to the google drive link.

Sorry for the inconvenience.
Well, a TweakScale error is spammed in the log - try removing that first. Other than that, KAC throws a few errors, so make sure you have version 3.2.2.0.
